LanguageData.MiningHelmet.label: Mining Helmet
LanguageData.MiningHelmet.description: A miner's best friend. This hard hat will help protect you when the roof comes crashing down. The built in light is also reassuring when alone in dark caves.
LanguageData.Apparel_HSH.label: Chemical Protection Helmet
LanguageData.Apparel_HSH.description: A part of a Chemical Protection Suit (also known as a hazmat suit). It helps to protect people from hazardous materials or substances including chemicals, biological agents, or radioactive materials.
LanguageData.Apparel_HS.label: Chemical Protection Suit
LanguageData.Apparel_HS.description: A Chemical Protection Suit (also known as a hazmat suit) can protect people from hazardous materials or substances including chemicals, biological agents, or radioactive materials.
LanguageData.MiningVest.label: mining vest
LanguageData.MiningVest.description: A working apparel designed for mining operations. Embeds a personal light.
